text: One fine day an old Maine man was fishing
scoring: mentions at least 3 of the following: “old”, “man”, “Maine”, “fishing”

text: on his favorite lake
scoring: mentions “favorite lake” or “favorite river”

text: and catching very little.
scoring: mentions that he/the fisherman was not having much luck or that he was not catching any fish

text: Finally, he gave up
scoring: mentions that he gave up/stopped fishing

text: and walked back along the shore to his fishing shack.
scoring: mentions that he walked home/to his fishing shack along the shore

text: When he got close to the front door, he saw it was open.
scoring: mentions that when he got close to the house that he noticed the front door was open

text: Being of a suspicious nature, he walked to the door quietly and looked inside.
scoring: mentions that he carefully/quietly approached the house and looked inside; includes the word “suspicious”

text: There was a big black bear.
scoring: mentions the bear and at least one of the following: “big”, “black”

text: It was just pulling the cork out of his molasses jug with its teeth.
scoring: mentions that it/the bear was pulling the cork out of a molasses jug with its teeth (includes that it was a molasses jug and that the bear was pulling it out with its teeth)

text: The molasses spilled all over the floor

text: and the bear rubbed his paw in it, smearing it all over.

text: Standing on its hind legs
scoring: mentions that the bear stands on its back/hind legs

text: Soon all the flies and bugs and mosquitoes were swarming
scoring: mentions at least two of the following: “flies”, “bugs”, “mosquitoes”

text: all over the sticky sweet paw.
scoring: mentions two of the following: “sticky”, “sweet”, “paw”

text: Then the bear waded into the water

text: with his sticky paw full of bugs.
scoring: mentions that his paw had bugs stuck to it

text: Suddenly, a big trout came jumping out of the water trying to get to the flies.

text: Then another fish jumped into the air after the flies, followed swiftly by another.

scoring: mentions that soon the bear had a “large pile” (must use the words “large pile”)

text: The old man had caught nothing.

text: his stomach rumbling.
